dict.acceptation: 索价；向前冲；记在账上；充电；

sent.orig: As a main part of perforating charge, liner greatly effects the charge's performance.
sent.trans: 药型罩作为石油射孔弹的关键部件，其参数变化从很大程度上影响着射孔弹的射孔性能。

sent.orig: Charge so-called 'trickle charge' can add up then and produce another enough electricity to recharge bettariesbatteries.
sent.trans: 不久之后，那个名叫“细流充电”的装置可以建立起来并产生足够的电量来充满电池。

sent.orig: The sample is free of charge.(The sample will be sent free of charge).
But sponsors do not charge all charge the same price for their services.
sent.trans: 但是担保人对与他们的收费是不一样的价码。

sent.orig: In charge of warehouses management and reporting. In charge of warehouse workers management.
sent.trans: 负责公司库房的管理，库房人员的管理。
